video_title: THIS IS WHY YOU’RE NOT GETTING INTERVIEWS ｜ 5 Things To Do To Your Resume To Get An Interview
transcript: hello everybody my name is nayan i'm the black female engineer i provide content for new and aspiring software engineers and today we're going to talk about why you're not getting
